      Returns a vector with all mappings of the configured Rest Bridges for the given context. This method is required since it can happen that the Rest Bridge was configured with different mappings multiple time for a same context.

    • Method Detail

      • addContext

        public void addContext(String contextName!)

      • configureRestBridge

        public void configureRestBridge(String contextName!, String mapping!, HashMap params!, String configFilePath!)

        Configures the Rest Bridge in the given context with the given mapping and parameters.

        Parameters:
        contextName! The name of the Context where to configure the Rest Bridge
        mapping! The Mapping of the Rest Bridge
        params! The HashMap with the Rest Bridge's parameters

      • editRestBridgeConfiguration

        public void editRestBridgeConfiguration(String contextName!, String mapping!, HashMap params!, String configFilePath!)

        Edits the existing Rest Bridge Configuration in the given context with the given initial mapping using the new mapping and the given parameters.

        Parameters:
        contextName! The name of the contet where the Rest Bridge is configured
        initialMapping! The initial mapping of the Rest Bridge configuration to edit
        newMapping! Possible new mapping of the Rest Bridge Configuration
        params! The HashMap with the Rest Bridge Parameters

      • getBBjspServlet

        public BBjspServletConfiguration getBBjspServlet(String contextName!, String mapping!)

      • getContextNames

        public BBjVector getContextNames()

      • getDefaultAuthProgramPath

        public String getDefaultAuthProgramPath()

        Returns the path to the default authentication program(authenticate.bbj)

        Returns:
        the default authentication program path

      • getRestBridgeContextConfigurations

        public BBjVector getRestBridgeContextConfigurations()

      • getRestBridgeMappingsForContext

        public BBjVector getRestBridgeMappingsForContext(String contextName!)

        Returns a vector with all mappings of the configured Rest Bridges for the given context. This method is required since it can happen that the Rest Bridge was configured with different mappings multiple time for a same context.

        Parameters:
        contextName! The name of the context
        Returns:
        a vector with all Rest Bridge Configuration mappings for the given context.

      • removeRestBridgeFromContext

        public void removeRestBridgeFromContext(String contextName!, String mapping!)

        Removes the Rest Bridge configuration from the given context witht he given mapping.

        Parameters:
        context! The context of the Rest Bridge configuration to delete.
        mapping! The mapping of the Rest Bridge configuration to delete.

      • restartContext

        public void restartContext(String contextName!)
